Module AppointmentScheduler
Package Application.Repository

Class AppointmentsCache

java.lang.Object
Application.Repository.AppointmentsCache
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICachable<AppointmentTable>
public class AppointmentsCache extends Object implements ICachable<AppointmentTable>
The AppointmentsCache is a singleton like instanced local cache object meant to store the collection of Appointment invalid input: '&' AppointmentTable type objects for access, reporting, deleting and editing purposes. Initially populates from the database and has schedule error validation.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Michael Short

    • timeSlotConflict

      public boolean timeSlotConflict(LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end)
      Provides an error handling flag for any specific LocalDateTime ranges to see if the range conflicts with pre-existing appointments in the collection. Uses a lambda function to return a bool of whether any appointments fall under the conflicting time slot criteria.
      Parameters:
      start - The start appointment LocalDateTime range
      end - The end appointment LocalDateTime range
      Returns:
      boolean of if the time range conflicts with a pre-existing schedule

    • timeSlotConflict

      public boolean timeSlotConflict(LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, int id)
      Provides an error handling flag for any specific LocalDateTime ranges to see if the range conflicts with pre-existing appointments in the collection. Excludes the id argument passed in on the basis of the associated appointment is the one being edited.
      Parameters:
      start - The start appointment LocalDateTime range
      end - The end appointment LocalDateTime range
      id - The id associated with the appointment time range to exclude
      Returns:
      boolean of if the time range conflicts with a pre-existing schedule
